posted: Five days ago, on Friday, 2012 Jun 01 at 14:52
tags: astronomy, outreach, Sun, Venus.
The 2012 June transit of Venus is sadly mostly a no-show for South Africans. However, there were a few surprises!

posted: Today, Wednesday, 2012 Jun 06 at 08:01
tags: magic, Cape Magicians Circle, Cape Town.

With demonstrations of techniques for escaping from police handcuffs, precision knife work, and discussion of stealing wrist watches, I noticed a theme developing at last night's meeting of the Cape Magician's Circle.
div.span: (photo: Meeting of the Cape Magician's Circle, 2012 July 05, Cape Town.)

div.p:
posted: Two days ago, on Monday, 2012 Jun 04 at 23:12
tags: astronomy, astrophotography, Southern Sky Highlights 2012, Kos Coronaios.
div.span: (photo: Full Moon rising, June 2012. Pic by Kos Coronaios.)

p.a: Winter in Cape Town is rough

div.p:
posted: Three days ago, on Sunday, 2012 Jun 03 at 16:47
tags: photo diary, Somerset West.
Inspired by a tweet from @RianVDM.

posted: Nine days ago, on Monday, 2012 May 28 at 05:28
tags: astronomy, atmospheric phenomena, Strand, photo diary.
div.span: (photo: Sunset behind Table Mountain, Strand, 2012 May 27)

p.a: Crescent Moon and Venus at sunset

div.p:
posted: 13 days ago, on Thursday, 2012 May 24 at 12:10
tags: astronomy, astrophotography, Southern Sky Highlights 2012, Venus, Moon, Kos Coronaios.
A slender lunar crescent and the Evening Star soon after sunset.
div.span: (photo: Crescent Moon and Venus at sunset. Limpopo. 2012 May 23. Kos Coronaios.)

p.a: Job hunting - it's a jungle out there

div.p:
posted: 18 days ago, on Saturday, 2012 May 19 at 11:05
tags: humour.

posted: 19 days ago, on Friday, 2012 May 18 at 07:59
tags: coffee, photo diary.
If you have one of these, you can make one of those.

p.a: ASSA Symposium to be held in October

div.p:
posted: 24 days ago, on Sunday, 2012 May 13 at 19:49
tags: astronomy, ASSA, ASSA Cape Centre, events.
ASSA is pleased to announce this year's symposium, which will be held from 12 to 14 October 2012 at the South African Astronomical Observatory in Cape Town.

posted: 24 days ago, on Sunday, 2012 May 13 at 15:08
tags: photo diary, Strand.
div.span: (photo: Sand sculptures, 2012 May 12, Strand, South Africa.)

div.p:
posted: 25 days ago, on Saturday, 2012 May 12 at 12:40
tags: humour.
All the cool things to see during 2012 in a handy two-page spread.

Transit of Venus, 2012 June 06
by Gerrit Penning, Ian Glass & Kos.

Sunset
by franc & C.

Die unieke Afrikaanse "fok"
by bella, Kirsten Bredekamp, Auke & Kirsten Bredekamp.

by Anonymous.

by bella.

by C.
